special_text:
[+1]: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an artifact card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
[-X]: Create a token that’s a copy of target artifact with mana value X.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you cast an artifact spell, gain control of target nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to that spell.”
